alert.note: Alert for White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 30 at 10:02PM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6500 feet and patchy blowing snow with wind gusts as high as 45 mph. Snow showers develop Friday morning and continue into Saturday morning, with the heaviest snow Friday evening into early Saturday. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Pinetop-Lakeside and Show Low. * WHEN...From 5 AM Friday to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute, as well as any New Year`s Eve travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Snow forecast from 5 AM Friday to 11 AM Saturday: Alpine 8 to 12 inches Pinetop-Lkside 6 to 10 inches Show Low 4 to 6 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
